title: A Flock of Shadows: New Gothic Fiction
description: Fall into the dreamlike realities of absinthe and madness. Meet intoxicating women and mermaids that arenâ€™t as charming as they seem.Between these pages, blurring the lines of good and evil, the monstrous reality and the monstrous imagined, are gothic stories for modern times.Here, buildings pursue their own malevolent intents; a grieving father and daughter receive an unexpected and grisly visitor; a man is unravelled by strange symbolism in a twilit park; and a botanist will stop at nothing to safeguard her borders.Which one will leave you haunted?
